name: Adaptation (trelans, basakcontu)
description:
You are a cute little organism formed after Big Bang and you need to evolve to survive in this world. Get inside fish, either control them strategically or explode them to make yourself bigger. Then you can be strong enough to kill a duck. After that, you will evolve cute little duck feet to help you walk and get out of the water. But be careful there are birds which see you as a delicious snack! If you can survive from here you will complete your evolution and get wings that will help you fly far far away...

CONTROLS 

Combo:  Space 

Move: Arrow keys 

Get Invisible (After earning the skill): Q

Only sound and music effects are ready-made. 

USED ASSETS 

Music: dargolan-free.com

Sound Effects: elements.envato.com, freesoundlibrary.com, freesound.org
